transcript:
Prince Andrew, vividly imagining the gray overcoats, wounds, the smoke of gunpowder, the sounds of firing, and the glory that awaited him. 
"Not that either. That puts the court in too bad a light," replied Bilibin. "It's not treachery nor rascality nor stupidity: it is just as at Ulm ... it is .. ."he seemed to be trying to find the right expression. "C'est . . . c'est du Mack. Nous sommes mackJs [It is ... it is a bit of Mack. We are Macked]" he concluded, feeling that he had produced a goo
